text:
OF CULTURE
संस्कृति मंत्रालय
GOVERNMENT
सत्यमेव जयते
SL
GRAMOPHONE RECORDS
up, till it became big, the king nourished it by moistening it with milk. As soon as it grew up, there were plenty of blossoms, buds, and young fruits upon it. He, imagining that its fruit would be very sweet, sent for one of them, and put it in his mouth; but on the contrary, he found it very bitter. Thus, though bad people may associate with good men from their earliest age, they will. never abandon their bad habits.
OF INDIA.
124
● भारत सरकार
